thread.title: 'Moonlight' Wins Best Picture... After 'La La Land'
thread.title_full: 'Moonlight' Wins Best Picture... After 'La La Land'

author: audra@dailydot.com (Audra Schroeder)
title: 'Moonlight' Wins Best Picture... After 'La La Land'
text:
Screengrab via ABC BTW 
The surprises didn't stop at Gary from Chicago . The best picture category got a major shakeup Sunday night at the Oscars after it was announced La La Land won. 
NOT! 
Presenter Warren Beatty, visibly confused, hesitated when he opened the envelope. Co-presenter Faye Dunaway then flubbed the winner and announced La La Land , when in actuality Moonlight won best picture. In a surreal moment, the La La Land cast had to leave the stage, and the Moonlight cast made its way up.
